overview: The smuggler Raja Sikder, the chicken thief Kadam Chora and the Prince - all have the same profession, Cheating people. Through these three, the character of the hypocritical people of the country has come up.  A 1998 comedy movie starring Rubel, Humayun Faridi, A.T.M Shamsuzzaman, Razib, Tamanna, Khalil, Nasir Khan, Eliash Kobra, Kobair Kha,Suruj Bangali, Jacky, Shamsuddin and others.
title: Vondo
